name: Notion
description: Enhanced integration with Notion API featuring database querying, block management, page property operations, and advanced search capabilities

search_notion.description: Search for pages and databases in your Notion workspace

query.description: The search term to look for in page titles and content

filter.description: Optional filter to narrow search results

value.description: Type of object to search for

sort.description: Optional sort criteria for search results

start_cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving next page of results

id.description: Unique identifier of the page or database

created_time.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the object was created

last_edited_time.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the object was last edited

url.description: URL of the page or database

properties.description: Properties specific to the object type

next_cursor.description: Cursor for pagination (null if no more results available)

has_more.description: Whether there are more results available

page_or_database.description: Additional metadata for page or database searches

request_id.description: Unique identifier for this API request

get_notion_page.description: Retrieve the content and properties of a specific Notion page

page_id.description: The unique identifier of the page to retrieve

created_time.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the page was created

last_edited_time.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the page was last edited

create_notion_page.description: Create a new page in Notion

parent.description: Parent page or data source where this page will be created

page_id.description: ID of parent page (if type is page_id)

data_source_id.description: ID of parent data source (if type is data_source_id)

title.description: Array of rich text objects for the title

id.description: Unique identifier of the created page

create_notion_comment.description: Add a comment to a Notion page

page_id.description: ID of the page to comment on

rich_text.description: The comment content as rich text

id.description: Unique identifier of the created comment

created_time.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the comment was created

get_notion_comments.description: Retrieve comments from a Notion page or block, optionally including info about child blocks with comments

block_id.description: The unique identifier of the page or block to retrieve comments from

include_child_blocks_with_comments.description: If true, also fetches child blocks and reports which ones have inline comments. This requires additional API calls.

start_cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving next page of comments

child_blocks_with_comments.description: List of child blocks that have inline comments (only present if include_child_blocks_with_comments is true)

block_id.description: ID of the block with comments

block_type.description: Type of the block (paragraph, heading_1, etc.)

comment_count.description: Number of comments on this block

next_cursor.description: Cursor for next page (null if no more results)

list_data_sources.description: List data sources within a database container

database_id.description: The unique identifier of the database container

page_size.description: Number of data sources to return (1-100)

start_cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving next page of data sources

id.description: Unique identifier of the data source

next_cursor.description: Cursor for next page (null if no more results)

has_more.description: Whether more data sources are available

get_data_source.description: Retrieve a specific data source's schema and properties

data_source_id.description: The unique identifier of the data source to retrieve

id.description: Unique identifier of the data source

query_notion_data_source.description: Query a data source with advanced filtering, sorting, and pagination

data_source_id.description: The unique identifier of the data source to query

start_cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving next page of results

results.description: Array of data source pages matching the query

next_cursor.description: Cursor for next page of results

get_notion_block_children.description: Retrieve child blocks of a page or block

block_id.description: The unique identifier of the parent block or page

page_size.description: Number of child blocks to retrieve (1-100)

start_cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving next page of children

next_cursor.description: Cursor for next page of children

has_more.description: Whether more child blocks are available

append_notion_block_children.description: Add content blocks to a page or existing block

block_id.description: The unique identifier of the parent block or page

children.description: Array of block objects to append

after.description: Block ID to insert new blocks after (optional)

get_notion_page_property.description: Retrieve a specific property value from a page

page_id.description: The unique identifier of the page

property_id.description: The unique identifier or name of the property

page_size.description: Number of property items to retrieve (for paginated properties)

start_cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving next page of property items

type.description: Type of the property (title, rich_text, number, etc.)

next_cursor.description: Cursor for next page of property items

has_more.description: Whether more property items are available

update_notion_block.description: Update the content of an existing block

block_id.description: The unique identifier of the block to update

checked.description: Whether the to-do item is checked

id.description: Unique identifier of the updated block

last_edited_time.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the block was last edited

delete_notion_block.description: Delete (archive) a block by moving it to trash

block_id.description: The unique identifier of the block to delete

id.description: Unique identifier of the deleted block

archived.description: Whether the block is archived (always true after deletion)

last_edited_time.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the block was deleted

update_notion_page.description: Update properties of a page (for database pages)

page_id.description: The unique identifier of the page to update

external.description: External icon URL (if type is external)

id.description: Unique identifier of the updated page

last_edited_time.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the page was last edited
